WARNING_NO_RESULTS.msg: Warning: Called successfully, but got no results

ERROR_SOME_IMAGES_ALREADY_UPLOADED.msg: Warning: Some images were already uploaded

FAILURE_EMAIL_EXISTS.msg: Error: Account with that email already exists

FAILURE_NO_USER.msg: Error: No user with that email

FAILURE_SOFT_LOCKOUT.msg: Error: Too many login attempts. Try again in 15 minutes

FAILURE_HARD_LOCKOUT.msg: Error: Account locked. Contact us for assistance

FAILURE_NOT_VERIFIED.msg: Error: Session token could not be verified. Please log back in

ERROR_NOT_AUTHORIZED.msg: Error: Not authorized to perform this action
